page.title: 02FARMING,SURVEY
page.content: { The Brockhampton}area is mostly a farming area.For example;{Home Farm is 37 acres the main crop is grass for 50 beef cattle.{Longacre Farm}is 14 acres but has 900 pigs,the main crop is pork with some hay.{Hyde Farm}has 170 cows and is a dairy farm,its main crop is grass.{Kaytes Farm}owned by Mr Shipway,has 101 acres but rents most of it out.There are 58 sheep,22 beef cattle,on the rented land.The main crop is grass.Mrs Savery of{ {Waterloo Farm}has 362 acres, 81 beef cattle and 50 poultry but the main crop is wheat.Mr Roberts owns{ {Homestead Farm}but its not a farm now,the land is sold off and is an ornamental ironworks.{Church Farm}is owned by Mr Shaw. He rents the farm , has 33\ acres and has 500 pigs 55 beef cattle and 500 poultry.All the land is controlled by {Tewkesbury Council.}
